name: Beat Heat
description:
Top down shooter with great beats and deadly waves. Shoot the correct monolith with Dub-step Gun to unleash a sound waves that stun the nearest enemies whit the same Color then shoot them to pieces whit you shotgun. MOVE: W,A,S,D Left click: shoot Right click: change weapon.
